name: Most Likely To: Drinking game
description:
Most Likely To is a drinking game! Created for adults. Use it in house parties, pub crawls or any other game nights with groups where you want to drink a little.

Read the statements, everyone points their finger to the person they think the statement suits best. Person with most fingers pointed at them drinks.

Or take one drink for each finger pointed at you (if you are in a hurry).

The statements are divided between 8 categories. If you don't want to talk about some topic, don't use that deck.

If you are too young, or easily offended, or you don't want to let people insult you, this is not a the game for you.

Hope you have an awesome time.
